core_meaning: Square between Pluto and Neptune drives friction/work. Pluto: . Neptune: . General tenor: growth via friction; endurance and clear boundaries are key.
risk_notes: Friction escalating into conflict; respect pacing and boundaries.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.
